description: This file defines security configuration for a Spring Boot application, setting up JWT-based stateless security, password encoding, authentication management, and HTTP security rules.

classes.name: SecurityConfig
classes.description: Configuration class that sets up JWT-based security, password encoding, and request authorization rules.

methods.name: passwordEncoder
methods.description: Defines a PasswordEncoder bean using BCrypt with a default strength of 10.

methods.name: authenticationManager
methods.description: Creates and provides an AuthenticationManager bean configured with UserDetailsService and PasswordEncoder.

methods.name: filterChain
methods.description: Defines the security filter chain with CSRF disabled, CORS enabled, stateless session management, request authorization, and JWT filter addition.
